commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<%- include('navbar') %>

Current Coupons

<% if(coupons.length > 0) { %> <% coupons.forEach((coupon) => { %>
Special Discount
Limited Time Offer
Coupon Code: <%= coupon.code %>

Discount

<% if(coupon.discountType == 'Percentage') { %>

<%= coupon.discountValue %>% Off

<% } else { %>

₹<%= coupon.discountValue %> Off

<% } %>

Min. Order

₹<%= coupon.minimumOrderAmount %>

Valid From

<%= new Date(coupon.startDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB') %>

Valid Until

<%= new Date(coupon.endDate).toLocaleDateString('en-GB') %>

Limited to <%= coupon. %> uses

<% }) %> <% } else { %>

No active coupons available at this time

<% } %>
<%- include('footer') %>
